Settle your SPay Later dues easily and conveniently with GCash. Enjoy real-time posting, a seamless experience, and fewer steps compared to other payment methods.

Learn how to pay your SPay Later dues with GCash below.

1\. On the Shopee App, tapÂ **Me > SPay Later**

2\. Select **Pay Bill > Pay Now**

3\. Tap **Please select**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/45590039035929)**

4\. Select **Payment Center / E-Wallet** as your payment method and choose GCash among the dropdown choices. Tap **Confirm**

**![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/45590056319897)**

6\. GCash will now be highlighted as your Payment Method. Tap **Pay Now > Pay**

7\. Enter your GCash mobile number and tap **Next**

8\. Wait for the SMS and enter the One-Time-Password (OTP). Tap **Next**

9\. Review your transaction amount and tap **Pay**

You will be led to a page that confirms your successful payment for SPayLater.
